author: jeremias
msg: Add method to decorate a filter to become "CVS-aware", thus filtering out all CVS directories. This is driven by some functionality in FileUtils as I'm refactoring that class.

author: jeremias
msg: Filters for the whole name, not just the prefix or postfix.

msg: Added self to STATUS, fixed bad HTML in package descriptions, updated navigation to include commons links.
